page.title: 13SIX MOUNTSORREL INDUSTRIES
page.content: The{Rolls Royce}in Mountsorrel makes {parts of jet engines }mainly supplied to{R.R.Derby.Parts made from sheets of {metal are built by the Derby factory {into engines}which are tested before delivery to the customer.600 people work here. Sheetmetalworkers,welders and machinists with inspectors to check the work.Staff also include turners,millers,grinders,drillers,tool room tradesmen,spark eroders,process workers,(furnace,paintshop etc.)and labourers.Non-manual Staff- production engineers,linemanagers,General SUPERVISORS Clerks,and Personnel Manager. The Company are now winning orders and the workload is rising for the better.COVERDALES make {HOSIERY,MORRIS' make BOOTS AND {SHOES,PAULSON & PORSON make {hosiery,KEEN-PACKAGING.QUARRY-Page 12.
